Description: Cloudformation template of creating icap servers under Load balancer

WorkloadClusterInstanceCount.Description: Enter number of instances to be created

WorkloadClusterKeyName.Description: Select Key Pair used for the SSH access

ServiceClusterKeyName.Description: Select Key Pair used for the SSH access

WorkloadClusterEc2RootVolumeSize.Description: Enter the EC2 root volume size

ServiceClusterEc2RootVolumeSize.Description: Enter the  EC2 root volume size

AdaptationServiceImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for adaptation-service
AdaptationServiceImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

ArchiveAdaptationServiceImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for archive-adaptation-service
ArchiveAdaptationServiceImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

EventSubmissionServiceImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for event-submission-service
EventSubmissionServiceImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

GlasswallIcapAdaptationEventApiImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for glasswall-icap-adaptation-event-api
GlasswallIcapAdaptationEventApiImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

MvpIcapServiceImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for mvp-icap-service
MvpIcapServiceImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

PolicyUpdateServiceImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for policy-update-service
PolicyUpdateServiceImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

IcapRequestProcessingImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for icap-request-processing
IcapRequestProcessingImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

ProxyRestApiImage.Description: Enter the identifier of Docker image for proxy-rest-api
ProxyRestApiImage.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid image localtion

LoadBalancerDNSName.Description: The DNS Name of load balancer

ServiceClusterIP.Description: The IP address of Service Cluster

Properties.GroupDescription: Incoming connections for Icap servers from LB
Incoming connections for Icap servers from LB
